title: What is this map glitch
body: I got this in game and it is weird, does anyone else get this?

replies.body: Looks like a graphics card issue.

You're playing Malzahar. Its obviously The Void.

In all serious though, it could be a graphical error based on your GPU like Terence says. If you have both integrated and external graphics on your PC, try switching around and going into a custom to see what happens.
Thats an artifact, its most likely your GPU dying.

That is bizarre.

Either restart the client, or attempt repairing.

If it's still there you will need to reinstall.

If it's still there then, well I dunno you will need to ask Riot.
